articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: The glaring security risks with AI browser agents - TechCrunch
articles.description: New AI browsers from OpenAI and Perplexity promise to increase user productivity, but they also come with increased security risks.
articles.content: New AI-powered web browsers such as OpenAI’s ChatGPT Atlas and Perplexity’s Comet are trying to unseat Google Chrome as the front door to the internet for billions of users. A key selling point of th… [+6181 chars]
